cells.data: -- stripPrefix :: Eq a => [a] -> [a] -> Maybe [a]-- stripPrefix :: String -> String -> Maybe Stringon stripPrefix(pfx, s)	set blnString to class of pfx is text	if blnString then		set {xs, ys} to {characters of pfx, characters of s}	else		set {xs, ys} to {pfx, s}	end if		script		on |λ|(xs, ys)			if length of xs < 1 then				if blnString then					set v to intercalate("", ys)				else					set v to ys				end if				Just(v)			else				if (length of ys < 1) or (item 1 of xs ≠ item 1 of ys) then					Nothing()				else					|λ|(tail(xs), tail(ys))				end if			end if		end |λ|	end script	|λ|(xs, ys) of resultend stripPrefix
